settings.label: Default content width
settings.info: Can be overridden by section settings (header, footer, collection page, product page etc.).

settings.label: Spinner style
settings.info: [Thanks to Tobias Ahlin for spinkit](http://tobiasahlin.com/spinkit/)

settings.label: Star rating
settings.info: This option requires [Product Reviews App](https://apps.shopify.com/product-reviews)

settings.label: Currencies
settings.info: Separate multiple currencies with comma: (USD,EUR,...). Use pipe to give a name to a currency: (USD|American Dollars,EUR|Euro,GBP|British Pound). If your shop currency is not in the above list, it will be automatically inserted into the currency list.

options.label: Change the currency only if that currency available in the currencies list above
Change the currency even it's not in the currencies list above

settings.content: Auto currency works only for the first time when a customer visits your shop. It detects the customer's country and change the currency into their local currency.
If the customer changes the currency manually after visiting your shop, auto currency changer won't change that customer's currency again.

settings.label: Logo image
settings.info: 128 x 25px recommended

settings.label: Add to Home Screen logo
settings.info: This logo will be used as Home Screen Shortcut logo on mobile devices (196 x 196px recommended).

settings.label: Favicon image
settings.info: Will be scaled down to 32 x 32px

settings.content: Body background color and image only visible if 'boxed' layout selected.

settings.content: If your product images don't have same dimensions, you can use the following settings to match their aspect ratios.

settings.label: Crop
settings.info: If the entire image won't fit in your requested dimensions, the crop parameter specifies what part of the image to show.

settings.label: Crop
settings.info: If the entire image won't fit in your requested dimensions, the crop parameter specifies what part of the image to show.

settings.label: Crop
settings.info: If the entire image won't fit in your requested dimensions, the crop parameter specifies what part of the image to show.

settings.content: Wishlist needs a custom page in order to work correctly. Create a new page, make sure its handle is 'wishlist' and select 'page.wishlist' as a template from Shopify's admin panel.

settings.label: Behavior
settings.info: Bar cart option only available if one of the bar ajax cart options (Left bar etc.) selected from 'Header' section options. If not, popup will be shown by default.

settings.label: MailChimp form action URL
settings.info: [Find your MailChimp form action URL](https://help.shopify.com/manual/using-themes/change-the-layout/theme-newsletter#add-a-mailchimp-newsletter-form-to-your-store-non-sectioned-themes-specific).

settings.label: Google Maps API key
settings.info: If you are experiencing issues with Google Maps on your store, you probably need to generate an API key: [JavaScript](https://developers.google.com/maps/documentation/javascript/get-api-key) and [Geocoding](https://developers.google.com/maps/documentation/geocoding/get-api-key) API keys

settings.label: Access token
settings.info: [How to get instagram access token](http://jelled.com/instagram/access-token).

settings.label: Menu trigger
settings.info: This option controls the site-wide menu triggers.

settings.label: Starting scale value
settings.info: Will transition from this value to 1

settings.label: Starting opacity value
settings.info: Will transition from this value to 1

settings.label: Jasper version
settings.info: Version number of the current Jasper theme. Required for import/export process.
